name: sap.watt.common.problems.problems
description: The Problems view displays information about any problems you may have in the projects in your workspace, and provides navigation to each problemâ€™s location. It is dynamically updated when you edit, add, or delete files in the project.

setProblems.description: Sets problems to be displayed in the 'Problems View' container

params.name: domain
params.description: Domain of the problems, such as 'validation', 'build'..

params.name: [problem]
params.description: Array of objects from type problem(Please check the wiki for the structure of problem)

clearProblems.description: Removes problems from Problem View container, remove can be done by domain(removes all problems in domain) or by domain and ids

params.name: domain
params.description: Domain of the problems, such as 'validation', 'build'..

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The name of the displayed project

titleUpdate.description: fired whenever any problems are set and a new title needs to match their location

titleDelete.description: fired whenever problem view is empty of problems

problemsUpdate.description: fired whenever any problem is set

problemsDelete.description: fired whenever any problem is removed
